Description: Familial Isolated Pituitary Adenoma (FIPA, incl. Familial Isolated Somatotropinomas, FIS, IFS, Familial Acromegaly)
Li-Fraumeni Syndrome (LFS, SBLA syndrome (Sarcoma Breast Leukemia Adrenal cancer), incl.: Cancer with In Vitro Radioresistence, Familial, Li-Fraumeni-like s.)
Carney Complex (Carney syndrome, NAME syndrome, LAMB syndrome, Familial Myxoma syndrome)
Cowden Syndrome (CS, Cowden disease, Multiple Hamartoma Syndrome, incl.: Lhermitte-Duclos; part of PTEN hamartoma tumour syndrome (PHTS) / PTEN-MATCHS, Cowden-like syndrome)
Genes: ATK1, KILLIN, PIK3CA, PTEN, SDHB, SDHD

Description: Denys-Drash Syndrome (Early Onset Nephrotic Syndrome-WT1 associated)
Hereditary Desmoid Disease (Familial Infiltrative Mesenteric Fibromatosis)
Diamond-Blackfan Anemia (DBA, Congenital Hypoplastic Anemia, Blackfan-Diamond Anemia, incl.: Aase syndrome)
Familial Adenomatous Polyposis (FAP, incl.: Gardner s., Attenuated FAP, Flat Adenoma s., Oldfield s.)
Noonan Syndrome (Male Turner syndrome, Pterygium Colli syndrome, incl. Noonan-like/Multiple Giant Cell Lesion syndrome; Noonan s. with multiple lentigines/LEOPARD syndrome)
Genes: CBL, KRAS, NRAS, PTPN11, RAF1, SOS1
